instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Retina 13" 820-4924 - No Display
threads.message:
820-4924 ( changed the SMC because of another problem with charging the battery and then shit hit the fan. The display stopped working!
[LIST]
[*]SMPS = 20v, power up on 400amp, and then stays at 700amp.
[*]NO Display
[*]Red water marks visible. Small corrossion on two components next to U7700 (backlight IC). Cleaned up!
[*]U7700 (VDD = 5v)
[*]U7700 (VDDA = 5v)
[*]U7700 (EN = missing) (I searched the line back to U8330(VCC = 3v) but missing the other lines EDP BKLT EN & LCD PSR EN & EDP" "PANEL PWR
[/LIST]
What could be the issue, those lines come from the CPU. But there was display before i changed the SMC. Could the problem be the new SMC?

threads.title: Retina 13" 820-4924 - No Display
threads.message:
Reball and put back its SMC.
BTW, does it charge the battery now?
